ModifFilter
object in module matches

Description

A bean to restrict a search results on modification

It will contain selected values, but also the selected one. And selecting a few searches will have an effect on available modifications and then protein This will be some "active" bean, as setting one will trigger the available other and so on

Methods

  • getSelectedModification()

    get the selected modification name

    Returns
    String

    modif name

  • init()

    launches the init process. Clean up properties and populate the searches

    Returns
    HttpPromise

    a promise of this

  • setSelectedModification(modif)

    set the selected modification name

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    modifString

    modification name

    Returns
    ModifFilter

    this
